headers.value: camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=(), payment=(), usb=(), magnetometer=(), gyroscope=(), accelerometer=(), fullscreen=(self), autoplay=()

default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.google.com https://www.gstatic.com https://www.googletagmanager.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https: blob:; connect-src 'self' https://api.kucoin.com https://api.binance.com https://api.coinbase.com https://pro-api.coinmarketcap.com https://api.coingecko.com https://www.google.com https://www.googletagmanager.com; frame-src 'self' https://www.google.com; worker-src 'self' blob:; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests;
